title: Star Wars skins for league of legends
body:
I think that League of Legends should come out with a series of Star Wars skin 
E.G
General Grievous-Cho'Gath 
Padmé Amidala- Leona 
Jar Jar Binks- Fizz
Chewbacca- rengar
Darth Vader- Zed or victor
Storm Trooper- Jayce 
Master Yoda- Gnar 
Anakin Skywalker- Ezreal

replies.body: pls no jar jar fizz omg it will tilt me so hard {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
fizz should be general akbar and obviously when fizz does his moves that make him untargetable he should be yelling out its a trap

**How about Yasuo as Kylo Ren?** {{champion:157}} Whenever Yasuo uses Windwall it a forcewall. Although the walking would have to be somewhat a mix between a running {{champion:11}} and a walking {{champion:23}} 

**Darth Maul Wukong? **{{champion:62}} Although it would be weird since Wukong speaks a lot and Darth Maul only had like 2 lines.

**Princess Leia Quinn?** {{champion:133}} Valor could be a miniature version of Han Solo's ship the Millennium Falcon. And when she uses her q the ship blows up and blinds them. Plus Quinn is ranged so she can have a blaster, like Leia (In most cases).

**Emperor Palpatine Ryze? **{{champion:13}} They both through lightning (And ik Ryze throws arcane bolts but it looks like lightning okay!?) and they both speak weird.

**Mace Windu Ekko?** {{champion:245}} A purple blade and a coat with a lightsaber through on the q? that sounds amazing!

** Chewbacca Graves? **{{champion:104}} Chewy has a blaster so it would make sense plus chewy with a cigar, perfect! xD

Well that's all i can think of. A Chewbacca Rengar just doesnt fit in my mind. Chewy has a blaster and Rengar has a... knife? Idk what its called but I do see where your getting the Chewbacca Rengar from. Plus i just think it would be hilarious with Graves being Chewy

**How about Yasuo as Kylo Ren?** {{champion:157}} Whenever Yasuo uses Windwall it a forcewall. Although the walking would have to be somewhat a mix between a running {{champion:11}} and a walking {{champion:23}} 

**Darth Maul Wukong? **{{champion:62}} Although it would be weird since Wukong speaks a lot and Darth Maul only had like 2 lines.

**Princess Leia Quinn?** {{champion:133}} Valor could be a miniature version of Han Solo's ship the Millennium Falcon. And when she uses her q the ship blows up and blinds them. Plus Quinn is ranged so she can have a blaster, like Leia (In most cases).

**Emperor Palpatine Ryze? **{{champion:13}} They both through lightning (And ik Ryze throws arcane bolts but it looks like lightning okay!?) and they both speak weird.

**Mace Windu Ekko?** {{champion:245}} A purple blade and a coat with a lightsaber through on the q? that sounds amazing!

** Chewbacca Graves? **{{champion:104}} Chewy has a blaster so it would make sense plus chewy with a cigar, perfect! xD

Well that's all i can think of. A Chewbacca Rengar just doesnt fit in my mind. Chewy has a blaster and Rengar has a... knife? Idk what its called but I do see where your getting the Chewbacca Rengar from. Plus i just think it would be hilarious with Graves being Chewy
C3P0 as Orianna but getting the genders mixed is a bit weird :/.
well they are the same people correct, but he is saying the skin.
What about blitz as R2D2 and tahm kench as jabba the hut

swap ez with shen, swap Anakin with Luke... That works well.

Shen father actually be zed, and the head of shens father what a construct of shens fathers head thrown at shens feet, so shen is fighting his father, and shen even has himself a lightsaber thing that follows him around, win win story mixup op

Maybe Han Solo can be for Jhin

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Darth Vader Kass instead.

He already does the breathing.
If you think of another skin idea post it down here
